Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: The plan-delete command attempts to delete a plan.
The command is a confirmed command.

FormalItem.title: Example
FormalItem.Verbatim:
[northpike]$ plan-delete --name com.io7m.example Confirmation required; this is a destructive operation that cannot be undone.
To confirm this operation, please enter:
plan-delete-confirm f44c6550-0850-42a2-a324-bc5294029c3e
[northpike]$ plan-delete-confirm f44c6550-0850-42a2-a324-bc5294029c3e
